Description: Lid of a limestone anthropoid sarcophagus with a lappet-wig and beard; no facial detail; two columns of incised Hieroglyphic text down the front flanked by representations of Isis, Nephthys and the Sons of Horus.
Curator's comments: Under study by Laurie Rouvière (Montpellier) with a view to publication, [ERO 14 Apr 2016].
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Sheikh Ali Abd-el-Hai el-Gabri
